queries.query: SELECT DM.DC_NAME, CM.CD_NAME, ES.ITEM_ID, IM.ITEM_NAME, IM.SPEC, TO_CHAR(ES.USABLE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), ES.QTY, ES.QTY_UOM FROM WMS_STOCK ES, ITEM_MST IM, DC_MST DM , ( SELECT CM.CD, CM.CD_NAME FROM CODE_MST CM WHERE CM.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND CM.CD_GRP = 'ITYPE' ) CM WHERE ES.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND IM.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND DM.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND ES.ITEM_ID = IM.ITEM_ID(+) AND ES.LOC_ID = DM.DC_ID(+) AND ES.ITYPE = CM.CD #if("$!{selected_if_date}" == "") AND ES.IF_DTTM = ( SELECT MAX(IF_DTTM) FROM ERP_STOCK ) #else AND ES.IF_DTTM = TO_DATE('$!{selected_if_date}','YYYY-MM-DD') #end AND ES.LOC_TYPE = 'DC' --물류거점인 것만 [AND ES.LOC_ID = '${selected_dc}'] --물류거점 [AND ES.ITYPE = '${selected_itype}'] --자재구분 변수 [AND ES.ITEM_ID LIKE '%${item_id}%'] --자재(제품)변수 [AND IM.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%${item_name}%'] --자재(제품)변수 ORDER BY DM.DC_NAME, ES.ITEM_ID, ES.USABLE_DATE

SELECT DM.DC_NAME, CM.CD_NAME, ES.ITEM_ID, IM.ITEM_NAME, IM.SPEC, TO_CHAR(ES.USABLE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), ES.QTY, ES.QTY_UOM FROM ERP_STOCK ES, ITEM_MST IM, DC_MST DM , ( SELECT CM.CD, CM.CD_NAME FROM CODE_MST CM WHERE CM.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND CM.CD_GRP = 'ITYPE' ) CM WHERE ES.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND IM.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND DM.MADE_TYPE != 'DE' AND ES.ITEM_ID = IM.ITEM_ID(+) AND ES.LOC_ID = DM.DC_ID(+) AND ES.ITYPE = CM.CD #if("$!{selected_if_date}" == "") AND ES.IF_DTTM = ( SELECT MAX(IF_DTTM) FROM ERP_STOCK ) #else AND ES.IF_DTTM = TO_DATE('$!{selected_if_date}','YYYY-MM-DD') #end AND ES.LOC_TYPE = 'DC' --물류거점인 것만 [AND ES.LOC_ID = '${selected_dc}'] --물류거점 [AND ES.ITYPE = '${selected_itype}'] --자재구분 변수 [AND ES.ITEM_ID LIKE '%${item_id}%'] --자재(제품)변수 [AND IM.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%${item_name}%'] --자재(제품)변수 ORDER BY DM.DC_NAME, ES.ITEM_ID, ES.USABLE_DATE
SELECT DC_ID, DC_NAME FROM DC_MST DM ORDER BY DC_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT(TO_CHAR( ES.IF_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) IF_DTTM
FROM ERP_STOCK ES
WHERE IF_DTTM = (SELECT MAX(IF_DTTM) FROM ERP_STOCK) AND MADE_TYPE != 'DE'
ORDER BY IF_DTTM DESC
